background.configuration.backgroundDescr:
The list of files, globs, or URLs to pull background images from.

* Use only `/` for directories, `\` is reserved for escape characters.

* Image URLs must be served over HTTPS
background.configuration.opacityDescript:
The background opacity.

`1` is fully visible and `0` is invisible
background.configuration.repeat.repeat_s: Repeat with even spacing to fill the screen
background.configuration.repeat.repeat_r: Repeat and stretch images to fill the screen
background.configuration.size.cover: Stretch image to fill the screen
background.configuration.timeDescription: How often to change the background image in seconds, set to 0 to never change
background.configuration.autoInstallDesc:
Automatically install backgrounds on startup.

This option is disabled when you run the uninstall command.
background.configuration.renderContentAb: Show images, PDFs, and markdown previews on top of the background
background.configuration.useInvertedOpac: Use an inverted opacity, so 0 is visible and 1 is invisible
background.configuration.smoothImageRend: Use smooth image rendering when resizing images instead of pixelated
background.configuration.settingScopeDes: Where to save background settings - Global or Workspace
background.extension.config.modInstall: Background has been modified, a reinstall is required to see changes.
background.extension.writer.snapError: Extension does not support snap installations, use deb or rpm
background.extension.writer.adminAsk: Failed to write changes, run command as administrator?
background.extension.writer.adminPrompt: Extension does not have permission to write changes, run command using administrator permissions?

background.menu.time.title: Change Time
background.menu.time.description: How long in seconds before the background should automatically change. Set to 0 to always use the same image.
background.menu.time.range: Background change time must be a positive number
